segments.text: What a mess in this kitchenâ€”water everywhere from that stupid overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's just standing there, polishing her plate like nothing's wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not hear the water splashing or feel it on her feet?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids are climbing all over the place, making it worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on that flimsy stool, practically inviting an accident.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stuffing his hand into the cookie jar without a care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl, egging him on by reaching for cookies too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're ruining the floor and probably the cabinets with all this water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand how irresponsible this all looks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The dishes are stacked up, waiting to get knocked over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the pretty garden view can't make up for this sloppiness inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to snap out of it and fix this now.
segments.speaker: PAR
